ngoList.title: Adarsh Mook Badhir Vidyalaya
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Adarash Mook Badhir Vidyalaya Lakhimpur Kheri (U P) is established July 1976 in Distt. Kheri. This institute was founded by Sri Ram Dularey Verma for the better education and to make deaf mutes useful citizen and self reliant. This institute is only one such type of nearby five Distt  Piliphit , Shahjehapur , Hardoi, Sitapur, Bahraich. The school imparts free education all section of society without any discrimination. Handclapped children are takes in a active part in all activities like indoor and outdoor games. National festivals 15 August, 26 January, 2 October and Disabled day 3 December in every year celebrated. School building is own. The land of building was donated by distt. Majistrate Sri. Indu Kumar Pandey from willoughy memorial trust. Funds of the building is received from Netherlands with the help of Indu Rama Srivastav and some rooms are constricted by M P Funds Sri Ravi Prakash Verma and M L A Funds Sri. Dhirendra Bahadur Singh , Dr. Kaushal Kishor and Ram Gopal Verma. The school is aided from Social justice and empowerment (disability Deptt). Govt. of India. Now the school is running smoothly. Parents are satisfied school activities and imparting education to the deaf and dumb children.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: YOUTH AWARENESS PROGRAMME:- Society has been carrying out this programme at the registered office of the organization. The main aim of this programme to make youths so skilled that they can stand on their own feet, since food & vocational training is easy to learn and having excellent job opportunities, therefore it suits to youths of average mind also. This training centre is running well in area. Presently about 30 youths are taking training from this centre. This centre is running well in the area. HIV AIDS AWARENESS PROGRAMME:- No disease has ever ended the life, the way AIDS does. HIV has become the biggest challenge before the man kind as because it is an infectious disease the danger that it poses is immense. The only way to escape AIDS is to be aware of all the ways in which AIDS can take place. ENVIRONMENTAL AWARENESS CAMP:- Our organization organized an awareness camp on the occasion of World Environment Day at District- Farrukhabad. The main participants to this camp were rural people. Now a days pollution is the biggest problem before the world and lots of money is spend by every country to minimize the extent of such pollution. The basic aim of this pollution awareness camp was to create awareness among women so they may frame these ideas upon the mind of future generation. This camp was organized very successfully & liked by all participants very much. CHILD LABOUR WELFARE PROGRAMME In this programme we educate the 50 students in camp. We give them free education, free fooding, free stationery, books and other requirements. This competition develops the feeling of importance of education in their life, so that they can survive in this world and can know about their rights. In the school teachers not only give them theoretical knowledge but do also teach them how to behave and live in this surrounding. A programme on woman & child labour was organized by the Society on Labour Day in Farrukhabad. In this programme the volunteers aware the public about woman & child labour and told them about labour act to the participants. VILLAGE HANDICRAFT TRAINING PROGRAMME Keeping in the mind the objectives of removal of poverty by reducing the problem of employment the society has been instrumental in taking various concrete steps in the direction of removal of poverty, society has started a vocational training programme women and youths are provided training in the different field like screen printing training programme, beauty parlor training programme computer training programme, knitting and tailoring, chicken embroidery, secretarial practice training programme, type and shorthand, food processing, readymade garments and fashion designing etc. by experience trainers. In this center trainees are provided training in field of manual arts known as handicrafts. The main aim of this programme is to make the trainees so skilled that they may become self dependent and stand on their own feet. AWARENESS CAMP ON ANIMALS Society has also organized this programme at District  Farrukhabad in which vaccines & medicine etc. were provided to stray animals. It also tries to make people understand the importance of animals. The animals like dogs, cows etc. who are roaming on the roads get hurtled by speeding vehicles but there is nobody to look after them. Out of them many animals die in absence of proper treatment, society tries to overcome this problem and provides free of cost service to these animals only the thing needed is that people should become aware, and they should help these type of animals. Society is running this programme very successfully and is liked by people very much. WELFARE PROGRAMME FOR STREET CHILDREN Our society organize a awareness programme for street children in district Farrukhabad. In this programme we educate the 50 children in camp. We give them free education, free fooding, free stationery, books and other requirements. This programme develops the feeling of importance of education in their life, so that they can survive in this world and can know about their rights. CONSUMER WELFARE CAMP:- This consumer protection camp was organized by society in District- Farrukhabad. The basic aim of this camp is to provide consumers, the knowledge of their legal rights & if they feel that they are being exploited by anybody else they may go to consumer forum court for taking the relief because m Ignorance of law is no excuse. Therefore this camp was organized to provide legal knowledge to consumers. This camp was very much liked by the participants. VILLAGE DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM:- Under the Village development program of the society the farmers of two village of district were informed about the method of the scientific agriculture. On this occasion improved seed were distributed free of cost among the villagers apart from this they were demonstrated the methods of preparing vermicompost
